slide-1.title: How to Play
content: Domino Live is a game where you guess the outcome of the hand that will win: Player, Banker, or Tie, which will have a total value closer to the number 9.

slide-2.title: Card Values
content: Each card has a different number of dots. The value of the card is determined by the number of dots, and the easiest way to remember it is to group the cards into 7 categories. If the total value exceeds 9, only the last digit is counted (for example, 15 becomes 5).

slide-3.title: Results
content: The winner is the hand with the total points closest to 9. If the Player and Banker have the same points, the result is a Tie.
